question: Could you tell me the method of fulfilling all the prayers I've missed?
answer:
QUESTION
Could you also tell me the method of praying namaz-a-toobaah, because I think I've done something which is forbidden in Islam.
ANSWER


Share:
One has to make Qadhaa (make-up) for missed Fardh Salaats as well as Witr
Salaats.

We advise all the missed Salaats be calculated and a daily schedule be drawn
to make Qadhaa of all the missed Salaats. Insha Allah, by strictly following
the schedule, one will accomplish his responsibility of fulfilling all his
Qadhaa Salaats.

and Allah Ta'ala Knows Best

Mufti Ebrahim Desai
FATWA DEPT.
